headline: Ask HN: Facebook Business Manager hacked and now locked out of accounts
description:
Sorry in advance, but it's my turn for HN big tech support.

Our Meta/Facebook Business Manager account was hacked July 12, despite having 2FA. The hackers got away with spending $800k on scam ads and got our business manager & all ad accounts blocked.

We’re an adtech business and are losing tens of thousands in revenue per day until our ad accounts are re-instated. We have several open tickets with Meta/Facebook but not getting in contact with anyone who seems to be able to help. Almost 2 weeks later and still no update.

Anyone at Meta/FB that can help or point us in the right direction?

Thanks in advance
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 脸书业务经理被黑，现在被锁定的账户
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 臉書業務經理被黑，現在被鎖定的賬戶
description_zh-Hans:
事先很抱歉，但现在轮到我的HN大技术支持了。

我们的Meta/Facebook业务经理账户在7月12日被黑，尽管有2FA。

我们是一家广告技术企业，在我们的广告账户重新恢复之前，我们每天都会损失数万的收入。我们有几张与Meta/Facebook之间的公开票据，但没有与任何似乎能够提供帮助的人取得联系。

Meta/FB有谁能帮助我们或为我们指出正确的方向？
description_zh-Hant:
事先很抱歉，但現在輪到我的HN大技術支持了。

我們的Meta/Facebook業務經理賬戶在7月12日被黑，儘管有2FA。

我們是一家廣告技術企業，在我們的廣告賬戶重新恢復之前，我們每天都會損失數萬的收入。我們有幾張與Meta/Facebook之間的公開票據，但沒有與任何似乎能夠提供幫助的人取得聯繫。

Meta/FB有誰能幫助我們或為我們指出正確的方向？
